citation_persistence_requirements: Persist at least one repo citation per claim and one equation-origin citation (paper page or anchor doc).
Do not upgrade maturity stage without explicit evidence path + test artifact link.
mechanism_sentence_requirements: Every answer must include one sentence in the form: 'Mechanism: <inputs> -> <operator/dynamics> -> <observable output>'.
For exploratory claims, mechanism sentence must include uncertainty qualifier ('hypothesized', 'unverified', or equivalent).
